General.Name: Taekwang Ind
General.Description: Taekwang Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the synthetic fiber, textile, petrochemical, and advanced material businesses in South Korea and internationally. It offers synthetic fibers comprising acrylic fibers, nylon filaments, spandex, and low-melting-point fibers, as well as ring, open-end, acrylic, and acrylic blended spun yarns. The company also provides petrochemical products, including purified terephthalic acids, propylene, acrylonitrile, sodium cyanide, acetonitrile, ammonium sulphate, and hydrogen peroxide. In addition, it offers tricot and polyester fabrics; and advanced materials, such as carbon and aramid fibers. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
